A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Just downright\, bad storytelling. The movie insists on \"subverting expectations\"\, for the sake of \"subverting expectations\"\, which ultimately leads to a multitude of shortcomings. The story has little progression\, the character's arcs and characteristics are completely thrown by the wayside\, there's WAY too much off-putting humor\, and the Star Wars universe/lore itself gets deconstructed to the point where it feels spiteful. Rian Johnson clearly doesn't understand Star Wars\, let alone have a care for telling a cohesive\, and honorable story. Don't waste your time watching this dumpster fire
